meta.title: About VaaniVista - Bridging Languages, Connecting Cultures
meta.description: VaaniVista is a platform for seamless translation of text, audio, and video content into regional and official languages of India.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At VaaniVista, we are driven by the vision of a world where language is no longer a barrier to understanding and connection. In the diverse tapestry of India's languages and cultures, we see not division, but opportunity - an opportunity to bridge gaps, foster understanding, and celebrate our rich linguistic heritage.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to harness the power of technology to make information and entertainment accessible to every Indian, regardless of the language they speak. We believe that by breaking down language barriers, we can unlock the full potential of our nation's diversity, driving innovation, education, and cultural exchange.

textTranslation.title: Text Translation
textTranslation.description: Instantly translate written content into multiple Indian languages, preserving nuances and context.

audioTranslation.title: Audio Translation
audioTranslation.description: Convert spoken words between India's diverse languages, making podcasts and audio content universally accessible.

videoTranslation.title: Video Translation
videoTranslation.description: Subtitle and dub videos in various Indian languages, bringing global and local content to every corner of the country.

communityDriven.title: Community-Driven
communityDriven.description: Leverage the knowledge of our diverse user base to continuously improve and refine translations.

educationalResources.title: Educational Resources
educationalResources.description: Translate educational materials to support learning in regional languages and promote literacy across India.

realTimeTranslation.title: Real-time Translation
realTimeTranslation.description: Enable live communication across language barriers for business meetings, cultural events, and more.

impact.title: Our Impact
items: Facilitated the translation of over 1 million documents into 22 official Indian languages.
Enabled access to educational content for 5 million students in their native languages.
Supported 10,000+ small businesses in reaching customers across language barriers.
Contributed to the preservation and promotion of 50+ endangered Indian languages.
Partnered with 100+ NGOs to improve communication in healthcare and social services.

cta.title: Join the Language Revolution
cta.description: Be part of our mission to connect India through language. Whether you're a language enthusiast, a content creator, or someone passionate about preserving cultural heritage, there's a place for you at VaaniVista.
